class DjangoGunicornWSGIServer[source]

DjangoGunicornWSGIServer(protocol:str='http', name:str='django/gunicorn/wsgi', host:str='localhost', port:int=8000) :: BaseServer

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
server = DjangoGunicornWSGIServer()
server.start_server()
print(server.get_pids())
server.stop()
print(server.get_pids())
print(server.started)
